Welcome to the Web Tools section

In this section you can find lots tools, useful for the web and the webmasters.

.htaccess Editor

Choose your options and generate your .htaccess and your .htpasswd file!

Domain and IP Resolver

With this script you can easy resolve an IP address or a domain.

My IP

Here you can view your IP address, your referrer and your user-agent.

Port Scanner

With this script you can easy check if the most common ports on an IP address are open or closed.

Real-Time HTML

With this script you can easy view and edit your HTML code.

Source Code Viewer

With this script you can easy view the HTML source code of the web pages.

Speed Test

Test your connection speed with this simple script!

Website Status Checker

If you want check if a website is online or offline, now you can, by using this script.

Whois Look Up

Here you can research the ownership of a domain.
